sql.query:
SELECT id, gen_shop_id, shop_name_en, shop_name_bn, shop_name_hin, shop_logo, shop_mobile_no, is_watsapp, watsapp_no, email_id, owner_name, gst_in, is_rmc, rmc_no, is_fsc, balance_amount, is_sliding_img, pan_no, address, pin, kyc_status, status, created_by, created_on
FROM m_restaurant
WHERE (owner_name LIKE :P1 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR shop_name_hin LIKE :P2 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR shop_name_bn LIKE :P3 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR shop_mobile_no LIKE :P4 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR shop_name_en LIKE :P5 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR watsapp_no LIKE :P6 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */) AND market_id = :P7 /* {{$_GET.market_id}} */ AND cat_type_id = :P8 /* {{$_GET.cat_type_id}} */ AND deleted_on IS NULL
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT id, gen_shop_id, shop_name_en, shop_name_bn, shop_name_hin, shop_logo, shop_mobile_no, is_watsapp, watsapp_no, email_id, owner_name, gst_in, is_rmc, rmc_no, is_fsc, balance_amount, is_sliding_img, pan_no, address, pin, kyc_status, status, created_by, created_on
FROM m_restaurant
WHERE market_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.market_id}} */ AND cat_type_id = :P2 /* {{$_GET.cat_type_id}} */ AND deleted_on IS NULL
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT id, gen_shop_id, shop_name_en, shop_name_bn, shop_name_hin, shop_logo, shop_mobile_no, is_watsapp, watsapp_no, email_id, owner_name, gst_in, is_rmc, rmc_no, is_fsc, balance_amount, is_sliding_img, pan_no, address, pin, kyc_status, status, created_by, created_on
FROM m_restaurant
WHERE (owner_name LIKE :P1 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR shop_name_hin LIKE :P2 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR shop_name_bn LIKE :P3 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR shop_mobile_no LIKE :P4 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR shop_name_en LIKE :P5 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR watsapp_no LIKE :P6 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */) AND market_id = :P7 /* {{$_GET.market_id}} */ AND deleted_on IS NULL
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT id, gen_shop_id, shop_name_en, shop_name_bn, shop_name_hin, shop_logo, shop_mobile_no, is_watsapp, watsapp_no, email_id, owner_name, gst_in, is_rmc, rmc_no, is_fsc, balance_amount, is_sliding_img, pan_no, address, pin, kyc_status, status, created_by, created_on
FROM m_restaurant
WHERE market_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.market_id}} */ AND deleted_on IS NULL
ORDER BY id DESC
